Community Guidelines

Your story will be automatically reviewed for appropriateness. Stories are approved if they:

  • Share personal mental health experiences respectfully
  • Use appropriate language and tone
  • Don't contain harmful content or explicit details
  • Focus on support, hope, and shared experiences

Helpful Resources

Tools and support for your mental health journey

hotline

988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline

Free, 24/7 support for people in crisis. Call or text 988 to speak with a trained crisis counselor.

Call 988 ‚Üí

Crisis Text Line

Free, 24/7 support for people in crisis. Text HOME to 741741 to connect with a trained crisis counselor.

Text HOME to 741741 ‚Üí

Teen Line

Free, confidential peer support for teens by teens. Call 1-800-TLC-TEEN (1-800-852-8336) or text TEEN to 839863.

Call 1-800-TLC-TEEN ‚Üí
article

Teen Mental Health First Aid

A comprehensive guide to understanding and supporting teen mental health.

app

Headspace for Teens

Meditation and mindfulness app with content specifically designed for teenagers.

Learn more ‚Üí

Soluna

Mental health and wellness app designed for teens, offering mood tracking, coping strategies, and peer support.

Integrated youth mental health centers providing drop-in support, peer support, and clinical services for teens and young adults.
